name: Quest to Die Prototype
description:
Noobs are a restless breed, relentlessly curious and impossible to contain. No matter the environment, noobs will find away to wander every inch of it, and likely die in the process.

You are a noob. You know what to do.

~

Made for 1 Hour Game Jam! It took me two hours to make due to making code that should have just been boilerplate,  but hey, it sparked my imagination and brought to mind an idea I'd long forgotten. That's a win in my book.
